mapper.sql: id, batch_no, case_name, module_name, case_owner, case_step_num, case_result, newly_fail, keep_failing, case_start_time, case_end_time, case_duration
select batch_no from tb_testcase order by id desc limit 0,1
mapper.select: select tb_dashboard.batch_no, tb_dashboard.project_name, tb_dashboard.build_env, tb_testcase.id, tb_testcase.case_name, tb_testcase.module_name, tb_testcase.case_owner, tb_testcase.case_step_num, tb_testcase.case_result, tb_testcase.newly_fail, tb_testcase.keep_failing, tb_testcase.case_start_time, tb_testcase.case_duration from tb_testcase, tb_dashboard where tb_testcase.batch_no = (select batch_no from tb_testcase order by id desc limit 0,1) and tb_dashboard.batch_no = tb_testcase.batch_no order by tb_testcase.id desc

select tb_dashboard.batch_no, tb_dashboard.project_name, tb_dashboard.build_env, tb_testcase.id, tb_testcase.case_name, tb_testcase.module_name, tb_testcase.case_owner, tb_testcase.case_step_num, tb_testcase.case_result, tb_testcase.newly_fail, tb_testcase.keep_failing, tb_testcase.case_start_time, tb_testcase.case_duration from tb_testcase,tb_dashboard
and tb_testcase.batch_no = (select batch_no from tb_testcase order by id desc limit 0,1)
and tb_dashboard.batch_no = tb_testcase.batch_no
and case_name like concat('%',#{caseName},'%')
and module_name like concat('%',#{moduleName},'%')
and case_owner like concat('%',#{caseOwner},'%')
and case_result like concat('%',#{caseResult},'%')
order by
id desc
id asc
id desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_testcase (id, batch_no, case_name, module_name, case_owner, case_step_num, case_result, newly_fail, keep_failing, case_start_time, case_end_time, case_duration) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseStepNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caseResult,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{newlyFail,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{keepFailing,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{caseStartTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseEndTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into tb_testcase (batch_no, case_name, module_name, case_owner, case_step_num, case_result, newly_fail, keep_failing, case_start_time, case_end_time, case_duration) values
( #{caseInfo.batchNo}, #{caseInfo.caseName}, #{caseInfo.moduleName}, #{caseInfo.caseOwner}, #{caseInfo.caseStepNum}, #{caseInfo.caseResult}, #{caseInfo.newlyFail}, #{caseInfo.keepFailing}, #{caseInfo.caseStartTime}, #{caseInfo.caseEndTime}, #{caseInfo.caseDuration} )

id,
batch_no,
case_name,
module_name,
case_owner,
case_step_num,
case_result,
newly_fail,
keep_failing,
case_start_time,
case_end_time,
case_duration,

mapper.update:
update tb_testcase
batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_name = #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_owner = #{caseOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_step_num = #{caseStepNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
case_result = #{caseResult,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
newly_fail = #{newlyFail,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
keep_failing = #{keepFailing,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
case_start_time = #{caseStartTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
case_end_time = #{caseEndTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
case_duration = #{caseDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_testcase set batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_name = #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_owner = #{caseOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_step_num = #{caseStepNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, case_result = #{caseResult,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, newly_fail = #{newlyFail,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, keep_failing = #{keepFailing,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, case_start_time = #{caseStartTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, case_end_time = #{caseEndTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, case_duration = #{caseDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
